description: This file appears to be a test file for certain linked list and header management classes, specifically testing the behavior of template classes 'HLL' and 'LinkedList'. The filename 'testHLL.cpp' and its contents, including multiple test scenarios and class method calls, confirm it is a source test file tailored for these classes.

classes.name: HLL
classes.description: A template class representing a linked list, supporting operations such as addBack, remove, moveBack, and iteration.

classes.name: LinkedListIterator
classes.description: An iterator class for traversing the linked list.

classes.name: HAHeader
classes.description: A class representing a header with metadata, instantiated multiple times within the test cases.

methods.name: int testHLL(void)
methods.description: Main test function executing various linked list operations such as insertion, deletion, traversal, and concatenation using the HLL template class.
